tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InterviewFeedback (
    interview_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id UUID NOT NULL,
    interview_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    interviewer TEXT NOT NULL,
    interview_feedback TEXT,
    overall_rating INT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE interviews(
    interview_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id UUID,
    interview_date DATE,
    interview_time TIME,
    interview_location VARCHAR(255),
    feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE hiring_teams(
    team_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    team_lead UUID,
    team_size INT,
    team_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE InterviewSchedule (
  interview_id UUID NOT NULL,
  candidate_id UUID NOT NULL,
  interview_date DATE NOT NULL,
  interview_time TIME NOT NULL,
  room_number INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (interview_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
  feedback_id UUID NOT NULL,
  interview_id UUID NOT NULL,
  team_member_id UUID NOT NULL,
  feedback_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  rating INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (feedback_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (interview_id) REFERENCES InterviewSchedule(interview_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TeamMember (
  team_member_id UUID NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (team_member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE InterviewSchedules (
    interview_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(50),
    interview_date DATE,
    interview_time TIME,
    interviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    room_number INT
)

CREATE TABLE HiringTeams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    team_lead VARCHAR(50),
    team_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE Feedbacks (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interview_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_given_by VARCHAR(50),
    feedback_given_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Candidates (
    candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(50),
    candidate_email VARCHAR(50),
    candidate_phone VARCHAR(15),
    candidate_resume TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE interview_schedules (
    interview_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interview_date DATE NOT NULL,
    interview_time TIME NOT NULL,
    interviewer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE interview_feedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    interview_id INT REFERENCES interview_schedules(interview_id),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE hiring_teams (
    team_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    team_lead VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE team_members (
    member_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT REFERENCES hiring_teams(team_id),
    member_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    member_role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE candidates (
    candidate_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)
